Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant - does what it says on the tin.”

Reviews.Content: mixed reviews hotel found front desk staff helpful friendly expecting ritz pleasantly surprised little extras funny save carpeting bare concrete underneath bed lol bed extremely comfortable towels bath sheet towel size seen warnings bought own served purpose modern facilities fridge microwave flat screen tv budget conscious unexpected treat recommend closer downtown walk metro joyce

Reviews.Title: “Not the absolute worst but wouldn't stay there again.”

Reviews.Content: cheap hotel paid eclectic neighborhood vancouver front desk fantastic directions public transportation morning complaints front desk apparently couldnt afford carpet entire beds dirty unfinished concrete floor strips carpet hesitant walk barefoot didnt look dirty towels threadbare rough signs building directions garbage disposal weekly guests dont particularly stay cheap hotels rent week contributed feelings re dirty worn hotel didnt feel unsafe fairly quiet taste maybe step hostel own bathroom
